name: spring thing

spring thing is a simple asymmetrical shawlette that will add a pop of colour to your wardrobe and a spring in your step! knit with la bien aimée merino singles in our custom colourway, you had me at tricot, you'll be smiling with every stitch. a contrasting yarn held double creates a lovely border accent and the whimsical mini tassels increase the fun factor.


y a r n
la bien aimée merino singles (366m/400y per 100 gr skein)
mc: 1 skein, shown in colour you had me at tricot.
or approximately 366m/400y of a fingering weight yarn.

cc: 1 mini skein of la bien aimée merino singles (80m/87y per 20 gr skein), shown in colour yellow brick road.
or approximately 80m/87y of a fingering weight yarn.

n e e d l e s
main needle: 4 mm (us 6) 24” circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge
border needle: 5 mm (us 8) 32” circular needle or two sizes larger than main
needle size.
bind-off needle: 6 mm (us 10) or two sizes larger than border needle
(optional and a suggestion if you generally bo tightly).

n o t i o n s
1 locking stitch marker
blocking wires, mats and pins
crochet hook to attach tassels
